name: ShapeShot
description:
Ludum Dare 35 Entry

Blast your way through endless waves of shapey asteroids! Take down each asteroid with it's corresponding shapey bullet, or pay the price of beefing up the asteroid's health! Challenge your friends to see who can get the highest score.

Controls: A and D for movement, 1,2,3 on NUMPAD or J, K, and L for different bullets, and Escape to go to the main menu!
